title: Joomla Template for Business Consultancy Firms
shortDescription: Establish your online presence with Stratos, a premium Joomla template for business strategy agencies, consulting firms, or any innovation-driven solution providers. Showcase your services, industry expertise, and data-driven insights with a sleek, minimal design. With sections for service details, team introductions, and client testimonials, Stratos offers a polished platform built for meaningful business connections.
description: Stratos is a versatile Joomla template, expertly designed for business strategy agencies, consulting firms, and innovation-driven solution providers. With seamless integration of SP Page Builder, Joomla, and PHP, it ensures top-tier performance and compatibility. Customizable layouts, dynamic content support, and a fully responsive design allow you to manage and showcase services, simplify consultation scheduling, and deliver a polished, professional website. Stratos is the ideal solution to enhance your consultancy’s digital presence and offer an experience that sets you apart.
whatsIncluded: Captivating hero section with CTAs that drive action.
Showcase your services effortlessly with a service page and detailed service info.
Highlight your industry expertise with niche-focused industry and details pages.
Introduce your team with a dedicated team page.
Build trust by presenting customer feedback on the testimonial page.
Engage visitors with a clear and accessible FAQ page.
Make communication easy with a sleek contact page.
Share your brand story and vision through the About page.
Boost engagement with a blog and detailed blog posts.

keyFeatures.featureDescription: The elements of the contact form is perfectly styled and very easy to customize it.
Built on the architecture of the Helix framework, this means ultimate customization freedom.
Dynamic Content, also known as a CMS, allows for the creation and management of diverse content types, offering flexibility and scalability for different projects and layouts.
The template offers support for a multi-layered mega menu.
Built-in support for off-canvas menu, enabling a slide-out navigation interface, is available.
Incorporates a diverse collection of fonts from Google Web Fonts.
